briefTitle: Open Label Extension Study of Epratuzumab in Subjects With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Open-label, Extension Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of Epratuzumab Treatment in Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Subjects
summary: The primary objective of the study is assess the safety and tolerability of long-term epratuzumab treatment in subjects with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE)

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Prematurely Discontinuing Due to a Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) During the Treatment Period (Maximum 96 Weeks)

effectByArm.arm: Enrollment Cohort 1 Epratuzumab 600 mg Per Week (ES)
Enrollment Cohort 2 Epratuzumab 600 mg Per Week (ES)
